mapper.update: update settlecategory set SettleCode = #{settlecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SettleName = #{settlename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsDefault = #{isdefault,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DelMark = #{delmark,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, SettleCode, SettleName, IsDefault, Sequence, DelMark from settlecategory
